'''Michiya''' is an NPC in [[Enkanomiya]] that is encountered during the [[World Quest]] ''[[Tricolor File]]''.

==Location==
Michiya is located in the [[Vishap Research Lab]], a hidden subarea that does not appear on the map. See the [[Vishap Research Lab]] page for steps on how to get to this subarea.
